subject: Set framework to vite and outputDirectory to dist in vercel.json
body:
Vercel's auto-detection didn't pick up Vite â€” the build succeeded
but it looked for output in public/ instead of dist/. Setting both
explicitly resolves the "No Output Directory named public" error.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01UaGdKLgaAMkoTv4G1ga8sc
title: Set framework to vite and outputDirectory to dist in vercel.json
